sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"> <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <before>false</before> <description>add attribute to type field in sys_cs_channel</description> <name>Add Help Note to Chat Channel Type</name> <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback> <script><![CDATA[SNC.DictionaryAttribute.set('sys_cs_channel', 'type', 'ref_contributions', 'Cs Channel Type Field Help'); gs.log("Added help note on sys_cs_channel type.");]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-08-29 20:49:33</sys_created_on> <sys_id>21364dfb53be9010ad82ddeeff7b12ef</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Add Help Note to Chat Channel Type</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Glide Conversation Server" source="com.glide.cs">f9f62e472f000110d8a4d5f62799b60c</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_21364dfb53be9010ad82ddeeff7b12ef</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-08-29 20:49:33</sys_updated_on> <unloadable>false</unloadable> </sys_script_fix> </record_update>
sys_metadata_link.sys_name: Add Help Note to Chat Channel Type
